params._extendDurationFor: Duration till the unlocked tokens are extended.
params._feeSharing: The address of fee sharing contract.
params._vestingOwnerMultisig: The address of an owner of vesting contract.

deployFourYearVesting(address,address,ad.return: The four year vesting contract address.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

nodes.documentation: @dev Added an event to keep track of the vesting contract created for a token owner
